name: Princess Wedding
description:
(The play again button doesn't work on itch.io, so just refresh the page instead. Sorry!)

The title is a WIP. As is the game itself. Currently only the first scene is available as a demo. The final story will be 4-5 scenes long, with many possible endings.

You play as Allison Shinestar, an elf noblewoman, who is set to marry a mun (a generic human) princess in an arranged marriage. It is her wedding day. How she deals with this whole situation is up to you.

Leave a comment or hit me up on twitter for questions and feedback!
